title: That moment your playing aram and ALL 4 TEAMMATES D/CE at the same time
body: one of them is my friend irl so i know its the servers

replies.body: i too d/c and cant log in :/

just happened to me too, and was unable to log back in and reconnect for like 20 minutes. somehow my team was still winning without me and we won the game, but i got a popup after the game saying that i was a bad panda for leaving the game and that i must promise not to do it again. if this is some sort of blemish on my otherwise clean record in league, i think that should be removed since this problem was clearly on riot's side
I just dced in a ranked match and we were winning by a landslide and all of a sudden i dc and i still cant log back into the game
